root.name: InuYasha: A Feudal Fairy Tale
root.description: OverviewInuYasha: A Feudal Fairy Tale is a fighting game developed and published by Bandai for the PlayStation platform.Play as 10 characters from the TV show Inuyasha in one on one head to head battles.GameplayThe gameplay is the standered 2d fighting game with that loosely follow's along the story of Inuyasha and co. On a quest to get the jewel shards, and or beating them out of your opponent. The game includes mingames and all the character's you've come to love, or hate, in the series and every character coming with his or her own special moves that can lead you to victory.

similar_games.game: Super Street Fighter II Turbo HD Remix
